title: Top Places to visit in Chirang, Kajalgaon, Assam
content:
Narshingbari district is an administrative district in BTAD, Assam state in the North-East of India.
 
History
It is a relatively new district in the BTAD area of Assam. Chirang district has been carved out from Bongaigaon district in 2004. The word "Chirang" has deri
